org.jclouds.abiquo.domain.infrastructure

Class RemoteService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jclouds.abiquo.domain.DomainWrapper<com.abiquo.server.core.infrastructure.RemoteServiceDto>
      • org.jclouds.abiquo.domain.infrastructure.RemoteService

  • public class RemoteService
extends DomainWrapper<com.abiquo.server.core.infrastructure.RemoteServiceDto>
    Adds high level functionality to RemoteServiceDto. The Remote Service resource offers the functionality of managing the remote services of a datacenter in a logical way.
    Author:
    Ignasi Barrera, Francesc Montserrat
    See Also:
    http://community.abiquo.com/display/ABI20/RemoteServiceResource
